# Introduction
A researcher wants to analyse and prepare a report on the nation’s travel
patterns across time and places in the USA. He considered travel patterns
of all 50 states of the USA from 2015 to 2019. He has extracted data
according to the following variables from the official website of the United
States Census Bureau.

1. year - year that data was recorded
2. region - region in which the state is located
3. state - name of the state
4. gender - gender of the workers
5. mode_of_trans - mode of transportation used to travel from home to work
6. count - number of workers
